meanings.definition: A person who owns or works in a vineyard.
meanings.sent1: The vineyardists carefully tended to the grapevines every day.
meanings.sent2: The vineyardists harvested the ripe grapes in the autumn.
meanings.sent3: The vineyardists decided to have a grape-stomping competition for fun.
meanings.sent4: The vineyardists were the guardians of the precious vineyard treasure.
meanings.sent5: The vineyardists' dedication to their craft was evident in the quality of the wine produced.
